title: Manic Panic Purple Haze Semi Permanent Vegan Hair Dye, 4FL OZ
description: Manic Panic Hair Dye Color Purple Haze 4oz.Manic Panichas created 32 vibrant colors. Some even glow under a black light! Manic Panic Hair Color Creams are packaged in their classic 4oz. tub.MANIC PANICis a conditioning semi-permanent hair color fortified with an herbal and protein complex. It can be used to achieve intensely bright colors on hair that has been professionally lightened to a very light blond, and on some natural blond hair.

title: JEROME RUSSELL Punky Colour Hair Color Crème Red Wine 3.5 oz
description: Punky Colour is the original semi-permanent conditioning hair color. Get outrageous color on bleached or chemically-treated hair. Create a brilliant highlight effect on darker hair.
